Haewon

Korean: 해원

Hometown:

Incheon

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Oh Hae-won
Native name:
오해원
Birthday:
Feb 25, 2003
Age:
22 years old
Height:
5'4" (163 cm)
Group (2022-present):
NMIXX

Introduction

Haewon is a South Korean singer and dancer under JYP Entertainment. She is best known as the leader of the girl group NMIXX.

She made her official debut on February 22, 2022, as the leader of NMIXX with their debut album "AD MARE".

JYP Entertainment:

Fun facts

1
Haewon's dream for NMIXX is to become a group that attracts not only overseas fans who like K-pop but also those who are new to K-pop.
…
2
According to Haewon, she has poor eyesight. When she wears her glasses, nobody recognizes her.
…
3
Haewon describes herself as honest and realistic.
…
4
Haewon once said that her specialty is doing yoga while sleeping.
…
5
Haewon loves doing squats. She is confident with her lower body strength.
…
6
Haewon is nicknamed Olaf.
…
7
Haewon is very flexible.
…
8
Haewon procrastinates a lot. She considers this as her weakness.
…
9
Haewon is not interested in MBTI.
…
10
She'd advise her pre-debut self to keep studying various languages.
